Title: Rings
Writer: David Loucka (screenplay by), Jacob Estes (screenplay by), Akiva Goldsman (screenplay by), David Loucka (story by), Jacob Estes (story by), Kôji Suzuki (based on the novel "The Ring" by)
Actors: Matilda Anna Ingrid Lutz, Alex Roe, Johnny Galecki, Vincent D'Onofrio
Plot: A young woman finds herself on the receiving end of a terrifying curse that threatens to take her life in 7 days.
Production: Waddieish Claretrap, Parkes/MacDonald, Vertigo Entertainment, Benderspink, Paramount Pictures International
